oic.sec.pomtype.description:
Device provisioning operation may be server directed or client (aka provisioning service) directed. The value is a bitmask encoded as integer and indicates the provisioning operation modes
1 - Server-directed utilzing multiple provisioning services
2 - Server-directed utilzing a single provisioning service
4 - Client-directed provisioning
8 - Unused
16 - Unused
32 - Unused
64 - Unused
128 - Unused
